OctaDist

A tool for calculating distortion parameters in coordination complexes.

View the Project on GitHub OctaDist/OctaDist.github.io

back to homepage manual

Supported File Format

XYZ file format

File extension: *.xyz

   <number of atoms>
   comment line
   <element 1>  <X> <Y> <Z>        # metal atom
   <element 2>  <X> <Y> <Z>
   <element 3>  <X> <Y> <Z>
   ...

Output of computational chemistry programs

File extension: *.out, and *.log

  1. Gaussian
  2. NWChem
  3. ORCA
  4. Q-Chem
